short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome plugin to monitor your internet usage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The GCB extension allows you to monitor the time you spend on every website, the Mb of data exchanged and the corresponding energy. You also have access to a toolbox to try and reduce your internet consumption. 

The code is open source and available here : https://github.com/Nos-Futurs/goodCodeBehavior

Feel free to contribute or share constructive criticism, this is an evolving project.
